title: Trump tells Republicans to be ‘flexible’ on abortion restrictions to get a health care deal
description: President Trump said he wants Republicans to reach a deal on health care insurance assistance by being willing to bend on abortion restrictions.
content: President Trump said he wants Republicans to reach a deal on health care insurance assistance by being willing to bend on abortion restrictions.
